body_html:
Hey Karan,
Could you please run python in gdb and report us the stack trace at the moment of the error? Try this:

gdb python
# a few lines printed here
> r main.py
# the script starts, and will stop when you hit a bus error
# once it stops write this and paste the result here:
> bt

Are you running with CUDA or just CPU?

Thanks!

(@soumith is it normal to have both pytorch and torch packages?)

body:
Hey Karan,
Could you please run python in gdb and report us the stack trace at the moment of the error? Try this:
```bash
gdb python
# a few lines printed here
> r main.py
# the script starts, and will stop when you hit a bus error
# once it stops write this and paste the result here:
> bt
```

Are you running with CUDA or just CPU?

Thanks!

(@soumith is it normal to have both `pytorch` and `torch` packages?)
